pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. -*-restructuredtext-*-.. image:: https://github.com/ubernostrum/akismet/workflows/CI/badge.svg :alt: CI status image :target: https://github.com/ubernostrum/akismet/actions?query=workflow%3ACI``akismet`` is a Python library wrapping `the Wordpress Akismetspam-detection service <https://akismet.com/>`_. All methods of theAkismet API are supported:* Checking comments for spam* Reporting comments incorrectly classified as not spam* Reporting comments incorrectly classified as spamUse of this module requires an Akismet API key (which must be obtainedfrom the Akismet service).The Python ``akismet`` module was originally written by Michael Foord.Full documentation is `available online <http://akismet.readthedocs.io/>`_.
